languages.text: "Предательство в рядах арбитров надо было расследовать быстро и безжалостно — как раз задача для особого отряда по захвату преступников. Соратники вызволили меня из плена, и теперь уже я слушал вопли своих мучителей".

"A betrayal in the ranks of the Arbites had to be investigated quickly and relentlessly — just the right job for a unit specialising in capturing criminals. My fellow Arbitrators rescued me from captivity, and then it was my tormentors' turn to scream."
languages.original_text: "Предательство в рядах арбитров надо было расследовать быстро и безжалостно — как раз задача для особого отряда по захвату преступников. Соратники вызволили меня из плена, и теперь уже я слушал вопли своих мучителей".

languages.text: 「高等裁定局内部に裏切り者が出た場合、迅速に、容赦なく調査しなくてはなりません。犯罪者の捕縛に特化した部隊にとっては格好の仕事です。同僚のアービトレイターたちが囚われていた私を救い出し、次は私を苦しめた者たちが悲鳴を上げる番でした」
languages.original_text: "A betrayal in the ranks of the Arbites had to be investigated quickly and relentlessly — just the right job for a unit specialising in capturing criminals. My fellow Arbitrators rescued me from captivity, and then it was my tormentors' turn to scream."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局内部に裏切り者が出た場合、迅速に、容赦なく調査しなくてはなりません。犯罪者の捕縛に特化した部隊にとっては格好の仕事です。同僚のアービトレイターたちが囚われていた私を救い出し、次は私を苦しめた者たちが悲鳴を上げる番でした」

languages.text: "Ein Verrat in den Reihen der Arbites musste schnell und mit aller Härte untersucht werden ... genau die richtige Aufgabe für eine auf die Festsetzung von Kriminellen spezialisierte Einheit. Nachdem mich die Arbitratoren aus der Gefangenschaft befreit hatten, war es mein Folterknecht, der schrie."
languages.original_text: "A betrayal in the ranks of the Arbites had to be investigated quickly and relentlessly — just the right job for a unit specialising in capturing criminals. My fellow Arbitrators rescued me from captivity, and then it was my tormentors' turn to scream."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Verrat in den Reihen der Arbites musste schnell und mit aller Härte untersucht werden ... genau die richtige Aufgabe für eine auf die Festsetzung von Kriminellen spezialisierte Einheit. Nachdem mich die Arbitratoren aus der Gefangenschaft befreit hatten, war es mein Folterknecht, der schrie."

languages.text: «Era necesario investigar una traición en las filas del Arbites de forma rápida e incansable: el trabajo perfecto para una unidad especializada en la captura de criminales. Mis compañeros Arbitrator me rescataron del cautiverio, y, después, fueron mis torturadores los que gritaron».
languages.original_text: "A betrayal in the ranks of the Arbites had to be investigated quickly and relentlessly — just the right job for a unit specialising in capturing criminals. My fellow Arbitrators rescued me from captivity, and then it was my tormentors' turn to scream."

traits.locale_text: «Era necesario investigar una traición en las filas del Arbites de forma rápida e incansable: el trabajo perfecto para una unidad especializada en la captura de criminales. Mis compañeros Arbitrator me rescataron del cautiverio, y, después, fueron mis torturadores los que gritaron».

languages.text: “一旦法务官内部发生背叛行为，法务部便会立刻进行毫不留情的彻查。惩戒小队专门负责抓捕罪犯，这是他们的职责。我的同伴将我解救了出来，而在那之后，就轮到那个折磨我的人惨叫了。”
languages.original_text: "A betrayal in the ranks of the Arbites had to be investigated quickly and relentlessly — just the right job for a unit specialising in capturing criminals. My fellow Arbitrators rescued me from captivity, and then it was my tormentors' turn to scream."

traits.locale_text: “一旦法务官内部发生背叛行为，法务部便会立刻进行毫不留情的彻查。惩戒小队专门负责抓捕罪犯，这是他们的职责。我的同伴将我解救了出来，而在那之后，就轮到那个折磨我的人惨叫了。”

languages.original_text: "A betrayal in the ranks of the Arbites had to be investigated quickly and relentlessly — just the right job for a unit specialising in capturing criminals. My fellow Arbitrators rescued me from captivity, and then it was my tormentors' turn to scream."

languages.text: "Arbites saflarındaki bir ihanetin hızlı ve acımasızca soruşturulması gerekiyordu. Suçluları yakalamakta uzman bir birime uygun bir iş. Yargıcı meslektaşlarım beni esaretten kurtardı, sonra da işkencecilerin çığlıklarını dinledik."
languages.original_text: "A betrayal in the ranks of the Arbites had to be investigated quickly and relentlessly — just the right job for a unit specialising in capturing criminals. My fellow Arbitrators rescued me from captivity, and then it was my tormentors' turn to scream."

traits.locale_text: "Arbites saflarındaki bir ihanetin hızlı ve acımasızca soruşturulması gerekiyordu. Suçluları yakalamakta uzman bir birime uygun bir iş. Yargıcı meslektaşlarım beni esaretten kurtardı, sonra da işkencecilerin çığlıklarını dinledik."

languages.text: « Une trahison dans les rangs de l'Arbites se devait de faire l'objet d'une enquête immédiate et implacable. Une mission sur mesure pour une unité spécialisée dans la traque des criminels. Mes frères arbitrators ont réussi à me tirer des griffes de mes geôliers... puis les hurlements ont changé de camp. »
languages.original_text: "A betrayal in the ranks of the Arbites had to be investigated quickly and relentlessly — just the right job for a unit specialising in capturing criminals. My fellow Arbitrators rescued me from captivity, and then it was my tormentors' turn to scream."

traits.locale_text: « Une trahison dans les rangs de l'Arbites se devait de faire l'objet d'une enquête immédiate et implacable. Une mission sur mesure pour une unité spécialisée dans la traque des criminels. Mes frères arbitrators ont réussi à me tirer des griffes de mes geôliers... puis les hurlements ont changé de camp. »
